Articles.Content:
Hi everyone! I'm new to the forums (though i have been reading it ever since i started playing ksp; which was about 2 weeks before .90 came out; wish i had known about it earlier). I Love the game and hope to play a more active role in the forum in the future. 

P.S. English is not mynative language so apologies in advance for any weird stuff i may post ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).

Hello. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

If you had not said you're not a native English speaker, I would not have known.

Hello! 

No need to apologize, your English is better than mine! If you ever need help with anything game-related just ask!

Welcome Zoidos, to one of the nicest places on the www. I am eager to see, what creations you will throw at us!

Be seeing you in orbit.

Welcome aboard.

Your english is fine. In many ways, better than many english speakers, so don't worry about it.

Feel free to ask questions if you need help, and enjoy the game and the forums.

LinuxGuruGamer
